pages.text: The Afghani Strain$(br2)Base THC: 18% $(br)Base CBD: 7% $(br)Effect: Bad Omen
Afghani Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Afghani Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Afghani Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Afghani Weed in an Extractor
You can package your afghani weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
